name: Escape The Pyramid
description:
In "Escape the Pyramid" you find yourself in the role of an adventurer who got lost in an Egyptian pyramid. In order to escape the pyramid, you must prove your dexterity and solve tricky puzzles. But be careful, the pyramid is full of dangers! Only if you successfully solve all the puzzles can you escape from the pyramid!

Important: You need a Virtual Reality Headset to play this game!

Credits

l2xuVR Interaction Programming, Arrows , Atmosphere (lights, sound)Valyrea3D Modeling, Puzzle ProgrammingWindixi
UI, 2D Art,Game Loop Programming, End Scenes
